question: The "Cordillera de Apaneca" mountain range is located in which country?
explanation: Cordillera de Apaneca is a volcanic mountain range of El Salvador. This mountain range houses one of the most active volcanoes of El Salvador, Ilamatepec Volcano. It is located at a height of 1816.05 metres above sea level. This mountain range posed great economic importance to the golden age of El Salvador's economy during the 1960s and 1970s. It was an important area of production and cultivation of coffee, which was highly appreciated for its quality.
